you can't get upset about stuff like snow..I have learned not to..as long a=

ar my file..I said ok Thanks for listening...because I know what half faceb=
ook and others have heard and myself thats all that matters some will hear =
it others won't..it's all good either way..you can't let it get to you.Its =
almost silly to.

n't even hear' as if I can't hear anything..I don't know..but this is not t=
hat important to me to get into...like I said and I didn't mean it in a bad=
 way..maybe what you hear is only meant for you..didn't mean for you to tak=
e offense to it.

u just mentioned Ursula as one of the people that can hear your files, but =
